allow: Bash(mvn clean install 2>&1 | grep -E "\(BUILD|Tests run:.*Failures|FAILED\)" | tail -5)
Bash(mvn clean install -q 2>&1 | grep -E "BUILD|ERROR|FAILURE|Tests run" | tail -20)
Bash(mvn clean install 2>&1 | grep -E "BUILD|Tests run|FAILURE" | tail -10)
Bash(mvn clean install 2>&1 | grep -E "BUILD|ERROR|FAILURE|Tests run" | tail -10)
Bash(mvn clean install 2>&1 | grep -E "BUILD|ERROR|FAILURE|Tests run" | tail -5)
